title: Make app work again
body:
This app so rarely actually plays a result for me anymore. Please make it work again.

It would be cool if other apps could open YouTube links with it (right now some links open the app and pass a search, some just open the app with a blank search, and some just don't get the option at all - from trying random posts from reddit).

I get it if it's been abandoned and people have moved on to other apps, but I still liked this one. Is it just a false sense of security that I don't see the video, or am I really only using the bandwidth of the audio?

title: Why you create HackTest??
body:
under this Hacktest there are two classes??
Actually This two classes are use anywhere??

title: Unreasonable permissions?
body: App requests "phone status and identity" and "retrieve running apps". Why are these necessary?

title: Network is unavailable.
body: When switching off wlan you say Network is unavailable when searching youtube, even though mobile data is still on. Is this intentional, or is there something wrong on my side?

title: Add button "Get it on F-Droid"
body: Please, add a button "Get it on F-Droid" with a PNG file from https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Get_it_on_F-Droid.svg in a file called README.md on GitHub and on your website, both with the appropriate link to the page of your app on F-Droid.

title: Error in accessing network
body: I get the error "error in accessing network" when using the search YouTube function.

title: Missing root project
body:
It looks like you didn't include your root project, so this app is not buildable right now. Most likely your directory structure looks like

```
./build.gradle
./settings.gradle
./app/
./app/build.gradle
./app/src/main/
```

and you only included the `app` directory.

title: Youtube API change
body: Please please add the new API so we can keep using this. It's the only for me to listen to listen to various sleep inducing streams with the screen turned of.

title: Title and control buttons overlapping
body:
![screenshot_2015-03-21-07-25-14](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10660264/6765275/1d25ba14-cfd9-11e4-9143-7f9e628c586e.png)

I am not sure how it should look like but on my mobile, it looks weird. The control buttons overlap the title in the area at the bottom.

I am running the current version from F-Droid on latest CM11 for Sony Xperia Z1Compact.

title: Added the ability to open Youtube links.
body:
When you open a Youtube link from another app (like a messaging application or a browser) it will ask you to open with "netmbuddy". If you select it, then it will search all the videos that match with the URL.

![2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6617055/3761433/34a0de3c-188a-11e4-90d7-0594fa8349d8.png)
![3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6617055/3761434/34aab97a-188a-11e4-9135-2410d63069d5.png)

body:
Dear yhcting:

Netmbuddy is a very good youtube hacking project.

But I meet some problems, there are some videos  can't play.
For example: 
PSY - HANGOVER feat. Snoop Dogg M/V

I got the url form netmbuddy code as follow:
http://r7---sn-ipoxu-u2xe.googlevideo.com/videoplayback?mt=1402392314&gcr=tw&mv=m&pcm2=yes&ipbits=0&ratebypass=yes&sparams=gcr%2Cid%2Cip%2Cipbits%2Citag%2Cpcm2%2Cratebypass%2Csource%2Cupn%2Cexpire&source=youtube&ms=au&fexp=906010%2C912300%2C913434%2C923341%2C923445%2C924203%2C930008%2C932617%2C933111%2C934026%2C945049%2C948102&expire=1402415572&sver=3&ip=114.32.29.226&key=yt5&mws=yes&upn=9MzzCmgQVe4&id=o-AF_vu2AP59DAZnEB-nwUJMS39ZFXLUMfPI4J_9ZSEZJ8&itag=18

It means the YTHacker.Java need to revise??

title: Feature request - changing list order
body: Is it possible to change list order? If it's not currently possible please consider adding some sorting/rearranging options.

title: feature requests
body:
Hi

This is an awesome app. Thank you. I have 2 requests if you do not mind
- ability to sort youtube videos based on upload date
- it would be great if this tool can be registered as thee default youtube player on android

Thanks
